bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That section 3 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended by adding a new subsection after subsection (2): GENERAL FEDERAL OTHER TOTAL FUNDS FUNDS FUNDS FUNDS BUREAU OF FINANCE AND MANAGEMENT (BFM) (3) Coronavirus Stimulus Pool Personal Services $0 $0 $0 $0 Operating Expenses $0 $1,396,090,776 $0 $1,396,090,776 Total $0 $1,396,090,776 $0 $1,396,090,776 F.T.E 0.0 Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2021 may be carried over to fiscal year 2022.

ENTITLED An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That section 3 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended by adding a new subsection after subsection (2): GENERAL FEDERAL OTHER TOTAL FUNDS FUNDS FUNDS FUNDS BUREAU OF FINANCE AND MANAGEMENT (BFM) (3) Coronavirus Stimulus Pool Personal Services $0 $0 $0 $0 Operating Expenses $0 $1,396,090,776 $0 $1,396,090,776 Total $0 $1,396,090,776 $0 $1,396,090,776 F.T.E 0.0 Adjust all totals accordingly. Section 2. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of fiscal year 2021 may be carried over to fiscal year 2022. An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021.
